subTiles.description: Calls from UI to the inference app backend
count of uniqe users

parametersMap.apmQuery: show (show traces omittedTo(max(genAIFeedback), 'noFeedback') as feedback where genAiQuery is not omitted and TraceStatus in ('Complete', 'Success') group by sessionid, genAiQuery) count(*) as value, feedBack as series group by feedBack
parametersMap.apmQueryCenter: show(show traces omittedTo(max(genAIFeedback), 'noFeedback') as feedback where genAiQuery is not omitted and TraceStatus in ('Complete', 'Success') group by sessionid, genAiQuery) count(*) as value

subTiles.description: Session counts with and without user feedback

parametersMap.apmTraceExplorerQuery: show(show traces  avg(case when genAiFeedback is omitted then ApdexScore end) as apdex, min(TraceFirstSpanStartTime) as StartTime, max(TraceLatestSpanEndTime) as EndTime, sessionId, sum(case when genAiFeedback is omitted then TraceDuration end) as waitTime, max(username) as userName, max(genaiFeedback) as feedback where genAiQuery is not omitted group by SessionId, genAiQuery) max(username) as "User Name", avg(apdex) as Apdex, count(*) as Invocations, max(endTime) - min(startTime) as "Session Duration", unique_values(feedBack) as Feedback, cast(avg(waitTime), 'duration_ms') as "Avg wait time",  cast(max(waitTime), 'duration_ms') as "Max wait time" group by sessionID, username order by count(*) desc

subTiles.description: Top session (by number of invocations)

subTiles.displayName: Questions resulted with a negative feedback

parametersMap.apmTraceExplorerQuery: show (traces) genAiQuery, count(*) as Count where genAiFeedback='thumb-down' group by genAiQuery order by count(*)

subTiles.description:
Update the widget to set the correct condition.
e.g.: show traces ... where genAiFeedback = 'thumb-down' ...
End user perspective invocations over time, by Webapp name

parametersMap.apmQuery: show traces apdexLevel, count(*) as count where component='BROWSER' and apdexLevel is not omitted and genAiQuery is not omitted and genAiFeedback is omitted group by apdexLevel
parametersMap.apmQueryCenter: show traces avg(apdexScore) as avg where component='BROWSER' and apdexLevel is not omitted and genAiQuery is not omitted and genAiFeedback is omitted

subTiles.description: Apdex for all UI interactions (configure the apdex threshold in the APM Domain adiminstration pages)

parametersMap.apmQuery: show traces  percentile(traceDuration, 90) as value, WebApplicationName as series where genAiQuery is not omitted and genAiFeedback is omitted group by WebApplicationName timeseries

subTiles.description: Slow response time: the 90th percentile of backend invocations

parametersMap.apmQuery: show traces  count(*)/count_distinct(sessionID) as value where genAiQuery is not omitted and genAiFeedback is omitted

subTiles.description: Average invocation per user session (usually user session = LLM conversatoin)

parametersMap.apmQuery: show spans genAiModel as series, avg(SpanDuration) as value where OperationName = 'invoke' group by genAiModel timeseries

subTiles.description:
Response time of thr LLM 'invoke' call, break down by model.
(update the TQL if the operationName of the invocation is different).

parametersMap.apmQuery: show spans count(*) as value, genAiFeedback as series where genAiFeedback is not omitted group by genAiFeedback timeseries
show spans count(*) as value where kind = 'SERVER'  and genAiQuery is not omitted

show (show traces omittedTo(max(genAIFeedback), 'noFeedback') as feedback where genAiQuery is not omitted and TraceStatus in ('Complete', 'Success') group by sessionid, genAiQuery) count(*) as value, feedBack as series group by feedBack
parametersMap.apmQueryCenter: show(show traces omittedTo(max(genAIFeedback), 'noFeedback') as feedback where genAiQuery is not omitted and TraceStatus in ('Complete', 'Success') group by sessionid, genAiQuery) count(*) as value

subTiles.description: Session counts with and without user feedback
Cluster by response length and time it takes the LLM to respond (Yellow means the cluster is an outlier).

subTiles.displayName: Response time breakdown by genAI service
subTiles.description: Sum of all wait times by the genAi service type

parametersMap.apmQuery: show spans genAiService as series, sum(genAICost) as value where genAICost is not omitted group by genAiService timeseries

subTiles.description: Total cost (break down by genAIService type

parametersMap.apmQuery: show spans genAiService as series, sum(genAITokens) as value where genAITokens is not omitted group by genAiService timeseries

subTiles.description:
Tokens are calculated per model. Using inbound and outbound as reuqired by the model.
(this can be adjusted through editing of the relevant span enrichment rules. Alternativly, the token count may be cpatured by the agent, at realtime, using the mode API)

parametersMap.apmTraceExplorerQuery: show (show spans max(sessionid) as sessionId, max(username) as UserName, sum(genAiCost) as cost, sum(genAiTokens) as tokens, conditional_count(genAiService is not omitted) as invocations where userName is not omitted or genAiCost is not omitted group by traceid having min(genAiCost) is not omitted ) userName, sum(invocations) as "LLM Queries", sum(cost) * 100 as "Cost ($0.01)", sum(tokens) as Tokens, count_distinct(sessionId) as Sessions group by userName order by sum(cost) * 100 desc

subTiles.description:
Show total cost (in cents) of genAI models usage by users. 
(Cost per token/query can be adjusted by update of relevant span enrichemnt rules).

parametersMap.apmQuery: show (show (show spans max(genAiConvId) as sessionid, sum(genAiCost)  as cost where genAiConvId is not omitted or genAiCOst is not omitted group by traceid having max(genAiCost) is not omitted) sum(cost) * 100 as centsPerSession group by sessionid) avg(centsPerSession) as value

subTiles.description: Value is based on 1/100 of the genAiCost span metric.

parametersMap.apmQuery: show (show (show spans max(genAiConvId) as sessionid, sum(genAiCost)  as cost where genAiConvId is not omitted or genAiCOst is not omitted group by traceid having max(genAiCost) is not omitted) sum(cost) * 100 as centsPerSession group by sessionid) percentile(centsPerSession, 90) as value

subTiles.description: Value is based on 1/100 of the genAiCost span metric.

parametersMap.apmQuery: show (show (show spans max(genAiConvId) as sessionid, sum(genAiCost)  as cost where genAiConvId is not omitted or genAiCOst is not omitted group by traceid having max(genAiCost) is not omitted) sum(cost) * 100 as centsPerSession group by sessionid) max(centsPerSession) as value

subTiles.description: Value is based on 1/100 of the genAiCost span metric.

Value is based on the genAiCost span metric.
This metric can be set using Span Enrichment or directly by the agent.

tabindex="-1">Inferencing App Monitoring</h1> <h2 data-line="1" class="code-line" dir="auto" id="this-dashboard-is-designed-to-provide-information-and-analysis-of-inference-applications" tabindex="-1">This dashboard is designed to provide information and analysis of inference applications</h2> <p data-line="3" class="code-line" dir="auto">The dashboard uses tracing data collected from the UI (e.g. chatbot interface) and from the agent/backend service that interacts with the GenAI services; <strong>LLM, vector DB, and others</strong>.</p> <p data-line="6" class="code-line" dir="auto">See more information on how to use this Dashboard and how to instrument your inferencing app in the oracle quick start github repository, here: <a href="https://github.com/oracle-quickstart/oci-observability-and-management/tree/master/examples/genai-inference-app-monitoring" data-href="https://github.com/oracle-quickstart/oci-observability-and-management/tree/master/examples/genai-inference-app-monitoring">Inferencing app monitoring</a></p> <h2 data-line="8" class="code-line" dir="auto" id="instrumentation" tabindex="-1">Instrumentation</h2> <p data-line="9" class="code-line" dir="auto">You can use the OCI APM agents or OTEL agents to instrument your application. see general instructions here: <a href="https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/application-performance-monitoring/doc/configure-application-performance-monitoring-data-sources.html" data-href="https://docs.oracle.com/en-us/iaas/application-performance-monitoring/doc/configure-application-performance-monitoring-data-sources.html">Configure APM data sources</a>)</p> <p data-line="11" class="code-line" dir="auto">When possible, instrument both, the UI and backen inferencing app:</p> <ul data-line="12" class="code-line" dir="auto"> <li data-line="12" class="code-line" dir="auto">UI: Add and configure the browser agent to the index.html</li> <li data-line="13" class="code-line" dir="auto">If the backend is a java app, use the <a href="https://cloud.oracle.com/apm/apm-admin/admin/downloadAgents" data-href="https://cloud.oracle.com/apm/apm-admin/admin/downloadAgents">APM Java agent</a> to instrument it</li> <li data-line="14" class="code-line" dir="auto">For python apps use <a href="https://opentelemetry.io/docs/languages/python/" data-href="https://opentelemetry.io/docs/languages/python/">OTEL agent</a>.</li> <li savedSearches.description: End User perspective invocations. e.g.: questions asked by a user

parameters.apmQuery: show traces count(*) as Count, webApplicationName as "GenAi App" where genAiQuery is not omitted and genAiFeedback is omitted group by webApplicationName timeseries
show spans genAiService, sum(spanDuration) as totalDuration, count(*) as Count where genAiService is not omitted group by genAiService order by sum(spanDuration)

savedSearches.description: using cost per token as configured by span enrichment rules

parameters.apmQuery: show spans genAiModel, sum(genAiCost) as TotalCost where genAiModel is not omitted group by genAiModel timeseries

savedSearches.description: Single value (TQL based). Replace the default query with similarly structured one, aliasing the metric as 'value'.
Show number of count of different answers to the same question.

drawer.description: List of answers to the same question, orderd by first appearance. Drilldown to Tracae Explorer to see more information.

parametersMap.apmTraceExplorerQuery: SHOW SPANS min(startTime) as "First Seen", genAiResponse as Response WHERE kind='SERVER' AND genAiQuery ='$(row.genAiQuery)' group by genAiResponse order by min(startTime) asc

parameters.apmQuery: show spans genAiQuery, count(*) as Count, count_distinct(genAiResponse) as Divergence where kind='SERVER' and genAiQuery is not omitted and genAiResponse is not omitted group by genAiQuery having count(*) > 1 order by count(*)

savedSearches.description: Content is the value of the Text parameter
Cluster by length and response time (outliers in yellow)

parameters.apmQuery: cluster by show spans genAiResponseLength, spanDuration where kind='SERVER' and genAiQuery is not omitted

parametersMap.apmTraceExplorerQuery: show traces genAiQuery, *  where traceid in (show spans traceid where kind='SERVER' and genAiQuery is not omitted and genAiResponseLength >=  $(click.row.itemData.genAiResponseLength_min) and genAiResponseLength <= $(click.row.itemData.genAiResponseLength_max) and spanDuration >=  $(click.row.itemData.spanDuration_min) and spanDuration <= $(click.row.itemData.spanDuration_max)  first 10000 rows)

savedSearches.description:
Use the regex parameter to configure what count as "Failed to answer". Edit the "not in context data" and "I don't know" regex expresions to match the response of the used model. 

ONly the first 200 characters are searched.

parameters.apmQuery: show (show (show spans substr(genAiResponse, 0, 200) as text where kind = 'SERVER' and genAiQuery is not omitted) case when text is omitted then 'no-answer' when regexp_like(text, '$(params.notInContext-regex)') then 'not in provided data' when regexp_like(text, '$(params.dontknow-regex)') then 'don''t know' end as failedToAnswerBucket) count(*) as value, failedToAnswerBucket as Series where failedToAnswerBucket is not omitted group by failedToAnswerBucket order by count(*)

parametersConfig.name: notInContext-regex
parametersConfig.defaultValue: I couldn''t find .* in the provided|provided (context|text) does not

drawer.description: Queries that were not answered or answered with 'dont know'

parametersMap.apmTraceExplorerQuery: show spans genAiQuery, genAiResponse where spanId in (show (show (show spans spanID, substr(genAiResponse, 0, 200) as text where kind = 'SERVER' and genAiQuery is not omitted) spanid, case when text is omitted then 'no-answer' when regexp_like(text, '$(params.notInContext-regex)') then 'not in provided data' when regexp_like(text, '$(params.dontknow-regex)') then 'don''t know' end as failedToAnswerBucket) spanID where failedToAnswerBucket is not omitted first 10000 rows)
